channel.title: Arm blade
channel.description:
I haven't touched meta in awhile, so yes I know this model shits bricks. Idk how I thought of it, possibly because I was watching X-men wolverine thing and saw the dude with the swords coming out of his arms and somehow built that into this weird ass thing. And now I present to you, my shittiest model, the arm blade. Rate, hate, cc, w\e... Honestly this is for ingame appearances, but I have no idea how to do all that shit, so instead you get to see the meta render.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/219zybr.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/n4jf3k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j466wm.jpg[/img]
